name: Rajesh Nair
company_address: Prateeksha, Venniyoor Venganoor Po, TRIVANDRUM, Kerala, 695523
my_business: FLASHCHARGE  deliver end-to-end solutions for EV charging Stations including site assessment, infrastructure setup, charger installation, software management, and ongoing maintenance. FLASHCHARGE  enable seamless charging experiences for consumers while helping businesses and property owners adopt clean mobility. With growing EV adoption, integrated turnkey solutions ensure faster deployment, reliability, and long-term operational efficiency.
top_product: Our top product is the Turnkey EV Charging EPC Solution (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction). This is the comprehensive service where we take an empty plot and deliver a fully certified, high-power charging station ready for immediate operation. It includes site planning, government liaison for HT approval, transformer supply, all civil works management, installation of the DC fast chargers, and integration with our proprietary software. It is the single-contract solution that guarantees speed and compliance.
ideal_referral: 1.Project Director at a major Logistics Company that is planning to electrify its entire fleet in the next 12 months. 2.Industrial Park Owner who has acquired a new piece of land along a national highway in Palakkad.
top_problem_solved: We eliminate the financial and regulatory risk of high-power EV station development. Most clients get stuck managing three separate vendors (charger supplier, electrical contractor, and civil works). This leads to budget overruns, unexpected utility fees, and months of delay due to non-compliant High-Tension (HT) electrical work. Flash Charge Mobility is the single point of accountability that guarantees a fully compliant, future-ready station, on budget and on time.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite story is about our integrity and why 'end-to-end' means avoiding huge financial traps for our clients. We were working with a logistics firm that needed a large depot charging station for their new electric bus fleet. They had received a quote from a competitor that looked 20 lakhs cheaper than ours. Naturally, they asked us why. We dug into the competitor's fine print, specifically the High-Tension (HT) electrical infrastructure. It turned out the competitor's quote failed to account for a massive, mandated cost: the security deposit and statutory fees for the 750 kVA electrical connection from the utility. They only quoted the physical transformer and panel, not the fee required to activate the line—a fee the client has to pay upfront to the utility. That hidden, unquoted cost was ₹ 32 lakhs. Our end-to-end process at Flash Charge Mobility covers all government and utility liaison, so we knew that cost was non-negotiable and included it in our initial scope and consultation. By choosing us, the client avoided a sudden, budget-breaking surprise and delays that would have stalled their entire fleet launch. We didn't just install a charger; we provided financial transparency and regulatory compliance from day one. That’s the true value of an end-to-end partner.
